text: Try load it with `compiled-modules=no`, if it hangs Ctrl-C might give you a good backtrace.

elements.text: , if it hangs Ctrl-C might give you a good backtrace.

text: If I Ctrl-C early it indeed gives a nice trace of several modules being compiled. Later on though, still with 100% usage, it doesn't react to Ctrl-C anymore. I gave it a sigterm (15) signal which killed Julia and took my shell with it as well, so no trace at all.
